overview:
Gel FX Nails by Julie was formerly Julie’s Special Touch Pure Nails & Aesthetics. Now, with the desire to provide state-of-the-art services and non-invasive nail services and aesthetics, Gel Fx Nails by Julie has evolved providing safe & affordable services that you can trust. Julie provides services in a home-based salon located in Langley, B.C. (Willoughby).

Services provided are gel nails for hands and feet (soak-off gel polish), manicures and pedicures (both traditional & spa) and facials (both traditional and Galvanic).

You will be pampered with the finest products and services by an experienced, licensed professional with nine years of experience. Julie’s wealth of knowledge and understanding of the nail technology business will meet or exceed your expectations.

At Gel FX Nails by Julie all services are provided with a personal touch to ensure your comfort & relaxation. Service is friendly and attentive as well as smart and informed!

A relaxing manicure, pedicure (soak-off gel or traditional) or facial can be a wonderful treat by itself or the perfect finish to your day.

You will experience a sanitized & safe environment where cleanliness is of the utmost importance at Gel FX Nails by Julie.
